items.title: Episode 118: Moment of panic
items.content_html: Troubleshooting server problems.

items.title: Episode 117: No downtime
items.content_html: Some of the work this week including fixing the Sunlit crashing bug, updating the Micro.blog help site, and whether I should take the servers down for an upgrade.

items.title: Episode 116: Breaking up Facebook
items.content_html: This is an expanded audio version of my blog post today about Facebook and Instagram.

items.title: Episode 115: Parsing usernames
items.content_html: More recent work in Micro.blog for ActivityPub and domain name improvements.

items.title: Episode 114: Migrated podcast
items.content_html: Moving this podcast over to Micro.blog hosting, and thoughts on the Mastodon support we just launched.

items.title: Episode 113: Focus on smaller networks
items.content_html: An update on microcasting improvements, then thoughts on how the recent articles about Alex Jones and the problems with big social networks always stop short of any solutions. Intro music from Aaron Parecki’s 100 days of music.

items.title: Episode 112: To-do list for podcasting
items.content_html: Upcoming improvements to podcasting and some more thoughts on Anchor after listening to episode 35 of the Supertop podcast. Also, I misspoke the IndieWeb URL on this episode. The site deaths page is here.

items.title: Episode 111: Kicking off Homebrew Website Club
items.content_html: Following up on the Facebook API submission and last night’s Homebrew Website Club. The meetup is the first Wednesday of each month at Mozart’s Coffee.

items.title: Episode 110: Maybe a bullet journal
items.content_html: I just sent off the Facebook pages cross-posting for Facebook to hopefully approve, plus wondering if I should try a bullet journal to get more organized.

items.title: Episode 109: First to 30 episodes
items.content_html: How competition changes when you stick with something, with a few clips from the NBA Arena Tour podcast.

items.title: Episode 108: Facebook changes
items.content_html: I start by talking about microcasts, then go into the big job this week: adapting Micro.blog for Facebook’s API changes, plus thoughts on Twitter’s upcoming API changes too.

items.title: Episode 107: More of the YouTube model
items.content_html: I talk about the new performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, then take a detour into centralized podcasting hosts like Anchor and why I like Micro.blog’s business model better.

items.title: Episode 106: Dramatically faster
items.content_html: While out running a couple errands, I recorded this episode about an upcoming performance improvement to Micro.blog posting, with a follow-up on the recent new sign-up change.

items.title: Episode 105: Users without a blog
items.content_html: To start off the week, I talk about a bug that led to many users not creating a microblog after registering an account on Micro.blog.

items.title: Episode 104: Freshman orientation
items.content_html: Colleges often have a 2-day orientation to get students and parents ready for the school year to start. Micro.blog needs something like that.

items.title: Episode 103: IndieWeb Summit
items.content_html: I’m back from Portland and rolling out new features for Micro.blog.

items.title: Episode 102: Momentum
items.content_html: I talk about the just-released beta of Dialog, an Android app for Micro.blog, and the ability to delete accounts.

items.title: Episode 101: While waiting
items.content_html: I talk about the upcoming Icro release and what to do while waiting on things like the App Store that are outside our control.

items.title: Episode 100: One year
items.content_html: I record a microcast in the rain and talk about the new Micro.blog for Mac app and the fact that we’re a year in to Micro.blog.

items.title: Episode 99: Almost all about photos
items.content_html: I talk about the latest iOS update, why square photos are great, and responding to support email.

items.title: Episode 98: To really value it
items.content_html: Wrapping up the release of Wavelength and microcast support in Micro.blog.

items.title: Episode 97: Not quite there
items.content_html: Anticipating a new feature for Micro.blog and rolling out some server improvements.

items.title: Episode 96: Name brainstorming
items.content_html: Quick thoughts on Apple’s education event in Chicago, their new app Schoolwork, and the process for naming new apps. (And yes, I call it Schoolroom in the podcast by accident.)

items.title: Episode 95: Busy morning
items.content_html: Wrapping up today’s announcements, including a new Micro Monday and Micro.blog for Mac version 1.2.

items.title: Episode 94: Can’t talk about it
items.content_html: Working on a lot of things at once, and thoughts on the new Micro Monday microcast.
